page.title: 07LIVING AT BIRCH CLOSE
page.content: My daddy is a dairy man and we live at Lower Cottage, Birch, which is a farm and group of cottages surrounded by fields. The house we live in used to be two cottages, but years ago it was made into one. About six years ago the original farmhouse was burnt down. This house had not been lived in for many years. In December 1984, from our diningroom window, we could see a drilling rig across the fields. This drilling rig was working night and day for several months, but no oil was found.
